name: "Dealing" with Rhinos
description:
Note: It is unplayable for now. Will be continuing developing the game in our free time since each of us got busy when the jam started. Create a basic game design document; it's not necessary, but it helps you stay organized.

Gameplay similar to Hotline miami and Anger Foot.

You have been scammed by the Rhinos, left with no money but only cards, you thought of "dealing" them on your own. Your skill in throwing cards can one shot a rhino, but you're feeble body can only take so much. Can you reach the top unscathed or get stampeded on your way.

Credits:

Apollo - Programmer

Ayanne - UI Designer

Dabonky - 3D Artist & Music

Nsal - SFX
